item.description:
Please welcome Sharon England of SkyJuice New England (the maker of the rain barrels many of us already own!). Sharon will be giving an overview of rainwater collection methods and devices and typical systems for using collected rain water (most common being irrigation). Sharon will then go beyond that to discuss the next tier of rainwater use (washing machines and flush toilets) and then, finally, what needs to be done to rainwater if you want it for drinking!

6:30 Potluck
7:15 ish Presentation/Discussion
8:30 - 8:45 ish Wrap Up


Please see our Meetup Event RSVP Guidelines:
http://permaculture.m...

Please remember to bring your own potluck kit (plate/bowl/utensils/cup/napkin)!
Please consider bringing your digital camera and posting up a few photos after the event!
